channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Simple Payment Donations & Subscriptions Plugin by Paymattic – Best Payments Plugin for WP

item.title: CVE-2022-2565|2024-08-03T00:39:08.081Z -- unknown -- simple%20payment%20donations%20%26%20subscriptions%20plugin%20by%20paymattic%20%E2%80%93%20best%20payments%20plugin%20for%20wp
item.description: The Simple Payment Donations & Subscriptions WordPress plugin before 4.2.1 does not sanitise and escape user input given in its forms, which could allow unauthenticated attackers to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks against admins
